page.title: 16McCAIN'S FACTORY CAYTON
page.content: McCain's is an international frozen food company with factories in many countries of the world, including the parent factory in Canada, U.S.A., France, Australia, Holland, Germany and Spain. They opened their factory in Cayton in 1968 and it has expanded since then. It covers a site of 6 hectares. It employs between 600 and 1000 people depending on the time of year, 100 to 150 of them being Cayton residents. The factory produces a wide range of frozen food _ chips, pizzas, roasts, orange juice and dried potato flake. It also supplies many more products locally, from its other factories, such as fish, oven ready meals and gateaux. The factory can cope with 1000 tons of potatoes per day and can produce 400 pizzas per minute.
